parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table; 0-based index

title: IBomTableAnnotation.GetModelPathNamesCount
description: Gets the number of model pathnames in the specified row of this BOM table annotation.

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table; 0-based index

returns: Number of model pathnames in the specified row
remarks:
Call this method before calling
IBomTableAnnotation::IGetModelPathNames
to determine the size of the array for that method.
